overview: After his solo performance we see Dominik on the outskirts of what might be Prague. He is sitting in a chair with his laptop and he introduces each of the episodes. This is when we get short glipmpses of director/cameraman Daniel Jefferson. The film ends with a list of the films from which the episodes are taken fron superimposed over the climax of Dominik's solo from scene 1.
title: With Love, Dominik
